promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong ibex normal-type pokemon wearing a diamond mask. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Caprionyx, a a gigantic strong ibex normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Thumping Fall, Razor Wing. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "normal" or "Caprionyx". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, ibex-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This monumental creature graces pastures with its mighty presence. With Thumping Fall, it vibrates landscapes and Razor Wing shreds foes.
